meanings.sent1: The terylene used in the jacket is very durable.
meanings.sent2: She wore a dress made of terylene to the party.
meanings.sent3: The terylene fibers in the carpet seemed to dance when she walked on them.
meanings.sent4: His words were woven with terylene threads of sincerity.
meanings.sent5: The bright terylene colors stood out against the dull background.

meanings.definition: A fabric made from terylene fibers.
meanings.sent1: The shop sold terylene curtains that were easy to clean.
meanings.sent2: The terylene fabric felt smooth against her skin.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his terylene shirt was so light, it could float away.
meanings.sent4: Her dress shimmered like terylene under the lights.
meanings.sent5: The terylene material kept her warm in the chilly weather.
